text: The President of the Republic of Botswana is the head of state and the head of government of Botswana. ==List of Presidents == Picture Name (Birth–Death) Term of office Term of office Political Party Badimo c. 1470 Phatle Malete Lesokwana c. 1500 Mokgware Digope Dira Mmusi Maphalaola c. 1600 Maoke Mongatane Maio Kgomo Mokgwa c. 1700 Marumo c. 1780 1780 ===List of Presidents=== No. Picture
